text: وَقِيلَ يَـٰٓأَرۡضُ ٱبۡلَعِي مَآءَكِ وَيَٰسَمَآءُ أَقۡلِعِي وَغِيضَ ٱلۡمَآءُ وَقُضِيَ ٱلۡأَمۡرُ وَٱسۡتَوَتۡ عَلَى ٱلۡجُودِيِّۖ وَقِيلَ بُعۡدٗا لِّلۡقَوۡمِ ٱلظَّـٰلِمِينَ

translation.en: And it was said, "O earth, swallow your water, and O sky, withhold [your rain]." And the water subsided, and the matter was accomplished, and the ship came to rest on the [mountain of] Judiyy. And it was said, "Away with the wrongdoing people
translation.id: Dan difirmankan, "Wahai bumi! Telanlah airmu dan wahai langit (hujan!) berhentilah." Dan air pun disurutkan, dan perintah pun diselesaikan,400) dan kapal itu pun berlabuh di atas gunung Judi,401) dan dikatakan, "binasalah orang-orang zalim
